data.title: FontAtlas ReferenceCount problem ??
UI::PageView::scrollPages中除了判断_touchMoveDirection外还需要处理_autoScrollDirection
data.body:
重现方法，设置PageView滚动方向为垂直滚动，创建后不要触发touch事件，那么_touchMoveDirection将一直为初始值，此时调用scrollToPage，最终会进入scrollPages函数，而其内部仅仅对_touchMoveDirection进行判断，而没有处理_autoScrollDirection，导致滚动方向bug
版本为官网3.8.1正式版

data.title: Improve CCController
data.body: Include CCController headers in cocos2d.h, make the controller key code "enum class" (just like in EventKeyboard) and add a constant "KEY_NONE" for no key (also as in EventKeyboard).

data.title: Scale9Sprite opacity cant change when I setState gray
data.body:
cocos2dx 3.6
for example:
local img = ccui.ImageView:create()  
img:loadTexture("test.png")
img:setState(1)
img:setOpacity(50)

the img opacity is 255 
50 expected

data.title: Correctly calculate milliseconds on OSX
data.body: You were mixing milliseconds with microseconds when calculating frame interval, so the animations were really glitchy on OSX. This pull request fixes that and uses microseconds everywhere correctly which results in a smooth animation.

data.title: Is there any guide about continuous collision detection??
data.body:
I saw 2 APIs are used in DEmo. setCcdMotionThreshold() and setCcdSweptSphereRadius(), the description in header is not good enough to explain what they do.
I can not find anything about these APIs on the Forum. I really want to know the appropriate value of the params.

data.title: [js_bindings] Not received userData in JS from cpp CustomEvent (v3.6-3.8)
crash js::jit::AutoFlushICache
data.body:
When my game enters the background, there is a probability that it will crash.

```
SIGSEGV(SEGV_MAPERR)
#00 pc 00d28718 libgame.so js::jit::AutoFlushICache::AutoFlushICache(char const*, bool)
```

I did not find this function in SpiderMonkey, I can't understand why it's here to crash.
Who knows, could you tell me, or give me some advice.
thank you.

data.title: Combine Studio change for 2d components
data.body: @pandamicro @minggo Here's the cocostudio added / modified for 2d components that hope to be merge into 2dx engine, please review this PR.

data.title: [3.9] Fix bug if Node::setPhysicsBody is called multiple times
data.body:
Firstly, this fixed some inconsistency with the other components, as the compontents should have `COMPONENT_NAME` as their default name so they can be easily added/removed. This also fixes a problem if you call `Node::setPhysicsBody` multiple times, before 3.9 this set the new physics body, but before this pr it would do nothing on the second call as there is already the same component in the container(not the same behaviour as previous version).

@pandamicro @WenhaiLin this should be in 3.9 final as it is an important bug fix for backward compatibility

data.title: ios9 cceditbox键盘适配问题
Cocos2d-x JS ccs.csLoader.createNode() problem
data.body:
I just found that when I put two csd file in to same folder, let's say we have /Test/A.csd and /Test/B.csd
If we use CocosStudio to open A.csd, and drag a new Node created from B.csd, after that, we publish csd into json, and use ccs.csLoader.createNode("res/Test/A.json") , an error will occur saying : "/Test/Test/B.csd should be preload".

I supposed that createNode function was implemented somehow try to look for resource in its current path,
because A.csd is located in res/Test, so when it try to load B.csd (which is also located in res/Test/), it appended the path and result in res/Test/Test/B.csd.

I think it should allow us to sort our project file by using many folder, so I considered it as a bug.

sorry for my poor English
thank you for your attention
